column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////I have been here quite a few times - it's an easy place to tell out-of-towners to meet you
column2: and it's convenient for meeting friends who are loop-workers. The staff is upbeat and friendly
column3: including the hosts and baristas. There is always a longer wait on the weekends - and I like that those seated are separated from those waiting to be seated.
